subTitle: Settings for the MiniMasonry Gallery only. Used General settings: Slide Background Colour, Define File Filter and sorting, Define File sort Order, Show Caption, Short Caption, Images with GPS required, Max Width of Container in, Min Width of one CSS-grid Row

param0.info: Activate the fslightbox for Fullscreen Presentation. Mind: Requires the installation of another Plugin from me!

param1.text: Optimize Space needed for the Gallery
param1.description: Minimizes the Space needed for the Gallery
param1.info: Minimizes the Space needed for the Gallery

param2.description: Horizontal or X Gutter (Space, Gap) between Images in px
param2.info: Horizontal or X Gutter (Space, Gap) between Images in px

param3.description: Vertical or Y-Gutter (Space, Gap) between Images in px
param3.info: Vertical or Y-Gutter (Space, Gap) between Images in px

param4.text: Vertical Gutter-Y in px if one Row is shown
param4.description: Gutter-Y applied when only 1 column can be displayed in px
param4.info: Gutter-Y applied when only 1 column can be displayed in px

param5.description: Use left gutter on first column and right gutter on last
param5.info: Use left gutter on first column and right gutter on last

param7.description: Type the Google Maps API Key taken from the Google Cloud Platform page
param7.info: Type the Google Maps API Key taken from the Google Cloud Platform page
